Experience the freedom of starting your engine from a distance, warming up your car on chilly mornings, or entering your vehicle effortlessly with the touch of a button. Designed specifically for BMW models 118, F10, F11, F12, F13, F15, F18, F25, F39, F48, and F49, this kit ensures compatibility and optimal performance.

This Plug And Play CANBUS Kit is designed to seamlessly integrate a remote start and keyless entry system into your BMW. It utilizes the vehicle's existing CANBUS network for simplified installation and reliable communication.

  • CANBUS Compatibility: Designed specifically for BMW models listed, ensuring a plug-and-play experience with minimal wiring required.
  • Remote Start Functionality: Start your engine from a distance with the included remote control.
  • Keyless Entry System: Unlock and lock your vehicle doors remotely using the provided key fob.

This kit is designed to work with a range of BMW models.

  • Compatible Models: BMW 118, F10, F11, F12, F13, F15, F18, F25, F39, F48, F49
  • Power Source: Connects directly to the vehicle's electrical system.

Experience the convenience and security of remote start and keyless entry with this CANBUS kit.

  • Convenience: Start your car from inside your home or office on cold or hot days.
  • Security: Lock and unlock your vehicle remotely, providing peace of mind.
  • Improved Comfort: Pre-heat or pre-cool your vehicle before you get in.

This kit is designed for professional installation. However, its plug-and-play nature simplifies the process for experienced DIYers.

Installation typically involves connecting the CANBUS module to the vehicle's wiring harness and programming the remote controls.
